item.description:
Terminator Salvation starts at 4:20, so I was thinking we should meet at 4:00.

I am a huge fan of the first two Terminators, and have been waiting a long time for a Terminator movie that takes place in the Future. I especially love the future scene where the T-100 is crushing the human skulls under its feet.

This movie is supposed to have a lot of action and explosions. I hope it lives up to the Cameron Terminators.

After the movie we will be going to The Otherside Cafe.
We should get there around 7:00 after the movie.

It is located at 407 Newbury Street.

The easiest way to get there is take the green line to Hynes Convention Center, get on Newbury St, and walk across Mass Ave. It is on the right.

They have 14 beers on draft. Five of those are
Allagash White
Racer 5 IPA
Mayflower Golden Ale
Pabst Blue Ribbon
O'Haras Irish Stout

I love IPAs and Racer 5 is one of the best.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing near the ticket counter wearing a tie dyed beer shirt
item.name: Terminator and Beer
